*******************************************************************************
*                                                                             *
*         LUA RUNTIME ENVIRONMENT - DISTRIBUTION VERSION [NON-PATCHED]        *
*                                                                             *
*******************************************************************************

DIRECTORY:  .\DIST\
BINARIES:   .\BOT-CONNECT\LUA.EXE
INTEGRITY:  ORIGINAL / NATIVE

[ TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS ]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The LUA.EXE binary contained in this directory operates independently of any
system-wide 'LUA.BAT' patches or modified environment variables. 

FILE SYSTEM NOTES:
    Native directory structure, corresponding to the default paths
    defined in 'luaconf.h'.

EXECUTION:
    Run LUA.EXE directly from within the 'bot-connect' subdirectory to ensure
    the native package.path and package.cpath are utilized.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
